nodes.text: The Korriban Orbital Station was a space station that orbited the planet Korriban during the Cold War and the subsequent Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.

The Korriban Orbital Station was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. It serves as the spaceport for the Empire-only planet Korriban, and can only be accessed by Imperial players with their own ship. Players then can take a shuttle down to the Sith Academy on the planet's surface.
